main event: A French Naval Officer observed a luminous unidentified flying object in Mainz, Germany on September 27, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and luminescent with a blue spot in the center,The estimated size of the object ranged from 200 to 500 meters in diameter,The object was seen moving in a zig-zag pattern at a speed between 500 and 600 km per hour,The officer had 19 years of experience and was familiar with all types of aircraft,The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes from 1730 to 1800 hours.
